remarks: The set of trails between two vertices (in an undirected graph). (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 4-Nov-2017.)
statement:
trlon $p |- ( ( ( V e. X /\ E e. Y ) /\ ( A e. V /\ B e. V ) ) -> ( A ( V TrailOn E ) B ) = { <. f , p >. | ( f ( A ( V WalkOn E ) B ) p /\ f ( V Trails E ) p ) } ) $.
$d A f p $.
$d B f p $.
$d E f p $.
$d V f p $.
$d X f p $.
$d Y f p $.
$d f p $.
$d f p $.
